[ti:For You (Fifty Shades Freed) (《五十度飞》电影主题曲)]
[ar:Liam Payne/Rita Ora]
[al:For You (Fifty Shades Freed)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]For You - Liam Payne/Rita Ora
[00:05.04]Lyrics by：ALI PAYAMI/Ali Tamposi/Andrew Watt
[00:10.08]Composed by：ALI PAYAMI/Ali Tamposi/Andrew Watt
[00:15.13]Rita Ora：
[00:16.10]
[00:17.46]In your eyes I'm alive
[00:20.97]
[00:21.61]Inside you're beautiful
[00:23.16]Something so unusual
[00:25.40]
[00:25.93]In your eyes
[00:27.38]
[00:27.98]I know I'm home yeah
[00:32.71]
[00:34.37]Every tear every fear
[00:37.69]
[00:38.54]Gone with the thought of you
[00:40.22]Changing what I thought I knew
[00:42.30]
[00:42.86]I'll be yours for a thousand lives
[00:48.59]
[00:50.86]I'm free as a bird
[00:51.86]When I'm flying in your cage
[00:53.15]
[00:55.11]I'm diving in deep
[00:55.95]And I'm riding with no brakes
[00:57.48]
[00:59.38]And I'm bleeding in love when
[01:00.23]You're swimming in my veins
[01:01.62]

[01:04.99]
